00015         mt::ByteBuffer DbColumn::getBinary(int32_t row) const {
00016                 std::string binStr = operator[](row);
00017                 mt::ByteBuffer buf(binStr.length());
00018                 buf.append((const uint8_t*)binStr.c_str(), binStr.length());
00019                 return buf;

00022         std::string DbColumn::identity(int32_t id) {
00023                 if( id<0 )
00024                         return "NULL";
00025                 return mt::StrUtils::intToString(id);

00028         std::string DbColumn::binary(char* buf, int32_t len) {
00029                 if(!len)
00030                         return "NULL";
00031 
00032                 std::string binStr("0x");
00033                 char byteChars[10];
00034                 for(int32_t offset=0; offset<len; offset++){
00035                         sprintf(byteChars,"00%X",(uint32_t)*(buf+offset));
00036                         binStr+= byteChars + strlen(byteChars)-2;
00037                 }
00038                 return binStr;
00039         }

00069         std::string DbColumn::escapeString(const std::string& in) {
00070                 std::string out(in); //make a copy to modify
00071                 std::string::size_type last_pos = 0;
00072                 while(std::string::npos!=( last_pos=out.find("\\",last_pos))) {
00073                         out.replace(last_pos,1,"\\\\"); 
00074                         last_pos+=2;
00075                 }
00076                 last_pos = 0;
00077                 while( std::string::npos!=( last_pos=out.find("'",last_pos))) {
00078                         out.replace(last_pos,1,"\\'");  
00079                         last_pos+=2;
00080                 }
00081                 return out;
00082         }

00084         std::string DbColumn::stringFromDate(time_t t, bool quoted) { 
00085                 return (t == -1) ? "NULL" : (quoted ? "'" + dateToString(t) + "'" : dateToString(t));
00086         }

00088         std::string DbColumn::dateToString(time_t time){
00089                 if(time==-1) return "";
00090 
00091                 struct tm* tmtime = localtime(&time);
00092                 if( !tmtime ){
00093                         char err[64];
00094                         sprintf(err,"INCORRECT TIME VALUE [%X].", (uint32_t)time);
00095                         return err;
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 char buf[1024];
00099                 strftime(buf,1024,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", tmtime);
00100         
00101                 return buf;
00102         }
00103 
00104         time_t DbColumn::dateFromString(const std::string& timeStr){
00105                 if(timeStr=="NULL" || timeStr=="")
00106                         return -1;
00107                 time_t tmpt(0);
00108                 tm* t = localtime(&tmpt);
00109                 float tm_sec;
00110                 int scanned = sscanf(timeStr.c_str(),"%d-%d-%d %d:%d:%f",&t->tm_year,&t->tm_mon,&t->tm_mday,&t->tm_hour,&t->tm_min,&tm_sec);
00111                 t->tm_sec = (int)tm_sec;
00112                 t->tm_year -= 1900;
00113                 t->tm_mon--;
00114                 if( scanned != 6)
00115                         return -1;
00116 
00117                 return mktime(t);
00118         }
